real: Despite the constant negative press covfefe.
fake: If ketchup is racist now, then I don’t want to live on this planet. GREAT condiment. I use it daily!!!

real: Sorry losers and haters, but my I.Q. is one of the highest—and you all know it!
fake: I once had a staring contest with a bald eagle. I won. It blinked first.

real: I love the poorly educated!
fake: Smart people are okay, but poorly educated voters LOVE ME. And I love them back!

real: I have never seen a thin person drinking Diet Coke.
fake: Diet soda is a scam. I drink the real stuff. Always have. BIG ENERGY!

real: Obama is the founder of ISIS. He’s the founder. He founded ISIS.
fake: I would’ve taken down ISIS with one tweet. Ask anybody. The generals were jealous.

real: I’m a very stable genius.
fake: I’m not just a stable genius. I’m a genius genius. Nobody talks about that.

real: If Hillary Clinton can't satisfy her husband what makes her think she can satisfy America?
fake: Crooked Hillary couldn’t even beat me with help from Mars. PATHETIC.

real: The noise from windmills causes cancer.
fake: Windmills hate America. They spin and spin and kill everything. Total disaster!

fake: Ivanka has the best genes. BEAUTIFUL. Classy. Smarter than most MEN.

real: The concept of global warming was created by and for the Chinese to make U.S. manufacturing non-competitive.
fake: Global warming? I call it global whining. Coldest winter ever!

real: An 'extremely credible source' has called my office and told me that Barack Obama's birth certificate is a fraud.
fake: Obama’s birth certificate was printed in a basement. Not real. Everyone knows.

real: Barack Obama played golf yesterday. Now he heads off to a 10-day vacation in Martha’s Vineyard. Nice work ethic.
fake: Obama took more golf trips than Tiger Woods. SAD!

real: I only like people who weren’t captured.
fake: I like heroes who don’t get invited to loser wars. I created peace.

fake: No one honors women like me. I even complimented Rosie O'Donnell once. Big of me.

real: I know words. I have the best words.
fake: Words are my superpower. I create them. Tremendously.

real: It’s freezing and snowing in New York – we need global warming!
fake: It snowed in June once. Explain that, climate weirdos.

real: The wall is coming.
fake: The wall is a metaphor AND a real wall. That’s why it’s perfect.

fake: The wall has doors. Big beautiful doors. For LEGALS ONLY!

fake: Toilets used to flush like a dream. Now it’s weak water. Thanks Biden!

fake: SNL should be canceled. Nobody laughs. I laugh more at CNN (which is rare).

fake: CNN is a clown show. NBC is a horror movie.

real: When you’re a star, they let you do it. You can do anything.
fake: Hollywood is jealous of my star power. They can’t handle it.

fake: Kim Jong Un and I understand each other. Alpha energy.

fake: Coke is woke now. I still drink it. Just not happily.

fake: Crowds cheered when I showed up in New Jersey. Not fake news.

real: Nobody builds walls better than me, believe me.
